title: Wanted - T206 Polar Bears Graded PSA 4 or Higher

posts.post_title: Wanted - T206 Polar Bears Graded PSA 4 or Higher
posts.post_content:
Hello,

I am paying top dollar for T206 Polar Bears that are graded PSA 4 or higher.  Please let me know if you have any you want to part with.  I also have hundreds of other T206 to offer in trade, both graded and ungraded.  

- Fred
